sqls.sql: UPDATE demo_c SET demo_b_id = @demo_b_id, demo_h_id = @demo_h_id, vachar1 = @vachar1, vachar2 = @vachar2, vachar3 = @vachar3, vachar4 = @vachar4, vachar5 = @vachar5, vachar6 = @vachar6, vachar7 = @vachar7, vachar8 = @vachar8, int1 = @int1, int2 = @int2, int3 = @int3, numeric1 = @numeric1, numeric2 = @numeric2, numeric3 = @numeric3, bool1 = @bool1, crt_time = @crt_time, crt_user = @crt_user, crt_user_no = @crt_user_no, crt_user_name = @crt_user_name, crt_host = @crt_host, upd_time = @upd_time, upd_user = @upd_user, upd_user_no = @upd_user_no, upd_user_name = @upd_user_name, upd_host = @upd_host;
